dict.acceptation: [电]电池，蓄电池；[军]炮台，炮位；一组；[法]殴打；

sent.orig: Battery Park, please-but can you make a stop at Union Square?
sent.trans: 要到Battery国公园，但请在联合广场停一下。

sent.orig: Mainly divided into the following broad categories: high-temperature battery, low battery, long-life battery and power battery.
sent.trans: 主要分为以下几大类：高温电池，低温电池，长寿命电池以及动力电池。

sent.orig: Lithium-ion battery is the third generation following nickel-cadmium battery and metal-hydrogen nickel battery.
sent.trans: 锂离子电池是继镍镉电池、镍氢电池之后的第三代可充绿色电池。

sent.orig: In small or micro systems, nickel-hydrogen battery, nickel-cadmium battery or lithium battery can be uesd too.
sent.trans: 在小微型系统中，也可以用镍氢电池，镍镉电池或锂电池。
